questions.question_text:
Northern Trail Outfitters (NTO) is planning to create an HR help desk for its employees. IT recommends using Experience Cloud to build the HR help desk app.

What should NTO consider when building the HR help desk app?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
D. The HR help desk app can centralize knowledge and self-service into one experience site.

Here's why:

Centralized Information: Employees need a single, reliable source for HR information. A dedicated Experience Cloud site can house knowledge articles, FAQs, policy documents, and other resources.
Self-Service Emphasis: Empowering employees to find answers on their own reduces strain on the HR team. Experience Cloud allows for powerful search functionality and intuitive organization of resources.
Streamlined Experience: Instead of navigating multiple platforms or departments, employees have a one-stop shop for all their HR needs.

Selected Answer: D
One thing that NTO should consider when building the HR help desk app is that the app can centralize knowledge and self service in to one experience site. This means that NTO can use Experience Cloud to create a site that provides access to Knowledge articles, Cases, Chatter, and other features that can help its employees find answers, request assistance, and collaborate with HR staff. NTO can use Employee Cloud, which is a solution that allows NTO to create employee experience sites using Experience Cloud.

Selected Answer: C
C is correct.

choices.B: HR user profile is only available in Enterprise and Performance Editions with HR permission set license.
choices.C: The HR help desk app can centralize Chatter from all related active Experience Cloud sites in the org.
choices.A: HR user profile is only available in Employee Cloud with Employee permission set license.
choices.D: The HR help desk app can centralize knowledge and self service in to one experience site.

questions.question_text:
Ursa Major Solar would like to expose the custom object SolarPanels to its customer portal. This particular object contains 150 fields, and a majority of the fields are technical codes and internal information.

How should the administrator limit the fields available in the customer portal?

choices.A: Utilize the Developer Console with coding to hide unwanted fields.
choices.C: Create a page variation for the customer portal to hide unwanted fields.
choices.B: Utilize CSS overrides to hide unwanted fields.
choices.D: Use Field-Level Security to remove access to the unwanted fields.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
This is correct

D. Use Field-Level Security to remove access to the unwanted fields.

Field-Level Security (FLS) allows administrators to control which fields users can see and edit based on their profiles. By configuring FLS, the administrator can restrict access to the unwanted fields on the SolarPanels object for the profiles used in the customer portal. This ensures that only the necessary fields are visible to portal users, helping to streamline the user interface and prevent them from accessing internal or irrelevant information.

Selected Answer: B
B. Customer Service

The Customer Service template is designed to offer features tailored to customer support and self-service. It includes components that can dynamically display CMS content, such as Knowledge articles, FAQs, and announcements, allowing the site builder to easily update and manage the content to meet the needs of customers.It offers pre-built components and layouts tailored for customer support and engagement, making it an ideal choice for UC's needs to update CMS content frequently to meet customer requirements.

Selected Answer: B
B is correct

Selected Answer: B
The customer Service template is the only one here that has out-of-the-box components. B is correct.

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers (UC) updates its Salesforce CMS content often to meet the needs of its customers. The site builder wants to use a template with out-of-the-box components that dynamically update the CMS content on its Experience Cloud site.

Which template should the site builder use?

comments.content:
Choice A, "Delegated External User Administrator," typically grants broader administrative privileges, including the ability to manage external users' profiles, passwords, and roles. While this permission could technically enable users to add authorized users, it might provide more access than necessary for the specific task of adding users to view usage, billing, and payment history.

Choice B, "View and Manage Users," is more specific to the task at hand. It allows users to manage user records, including adding and modifying users, which aligns more closely with the requirement of adding authorized users for viewing specific information.

Therefore, while both choices technically grant some level of user management capability, choice B is more targeted and appropriate for the specific scenario described.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
B. View and Manage Users
Granting customers the "View and Manage Users" permission allows them to add authorized users who can view usage, billing, and payment history on their behalf. This permission provides the necessary access to manage user profiles and permissions within the system.

Selected Answer: A
A should be correct here.

choices.D: Modify All for Usage, Billing, and Payment History
